songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Man, really I just been goin' through a lot of shit
I just gotta play my cards, how I can play 'em
You know what I'm sayin', like
The hand I was dealt, you know what I'm sayin'
These pussy ass niggas wanna switch up they hand
You know what I'm sayin', these niggas some hoes
I see right through these pussy ass niggas
Yeah, yeah, Bans
Yeah, I see right through you
Nigga, I see right through you

[Chorus]
Ayy, hard times, I done been through 'em, yeah
On the block, I'ma get to it, yeah
Set up shop, I'm gon move it, ayy
Pussy ass nigga, I see right through you, ayy
Lame ass nigga, I see right through you, ayy
Catch you down bad, and I might do it
I'm a real solid nigga, nothin' like you
With my brother, he gon' show you what this pipe do

[Verse]
Ayy, yeah, young ass nigga I been goin' through a lot, ayy
I'ma scrape the pot, in the game, it's do or die, ayy
Gotta go and get it, so some niggas gettin' got
Only God know my fate, but I'm just tryna see the plot
I know these niggas plottin', 12 watchin'
Free my niggas out the cell, once I get it then I got 'em, ayy
Walkin' through hell with a bankroll in my pocket
And my shawty say she ridin', If I'm rollin' then she rockin'
All designer options, push up in a Maserati
Bitch, I'm so geeked up, all that purple in my body
Smoke a nigga like a blunt, but I can't hurt nobody
If a nigga try to rob me then I might just catch a homi'

[Chorus]
Ayy, hard times, I done been through 'em, yeah
On the block, I'ma get to it, yeah
Set up shop, I'm gon move it, ayy
Pussy ass nigga, I see right through you, ayy
Lame ass nigga, I see right through you, ayy
Catch you down bad, and I might do it
I'm a real solid nigga, nothin' like you
With my brother, he gon' show you what this pipe do

[Outro]
Bans
songs.title: Right Through You
